title: 4K - Battleship Potemkin (1925 Histroy) Revolution is the only lawful, equal, effectual war.

sources.title: 4K - Battleship Potemkin (1925 Histroy) Revolution is the only lawful, equal, effectual war.
sources.description:
Sergei Eisenstein's film had an incredible impact on the development of cinema and is a masterful example of montage editing. When Grigory Vakulinchuk (Aleksandr Antonov) sparks a revolt aboard the Potemkin, the crew clashes with Commander Golikov’s (Vladimir Barsk) harsh command, turning the Black Sea into a battleground. As Odessa’s streets surge with rebellion, the battleship charges forward, cannons roaring and the crew forging a united front. From rotten rations to revolutionary fire, Vakulinchuk’s defiance etches the Potemkin into history as a beacon of rebellion.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/ZnGchlxMZ50


Original title: Bronenosets Potyomkin / Броненосец Потёмкин
Director: Sergei Eisenstein
Writers: Nina Agadzhanova, Sergei Eisenstein, Grigoriy Aleksandrov
Stars: Aleksandr Antonov, Vladimir Barskiy, Grigoriy Aleksandrov
Genres: Docudrama, Period drama, Historical Epic, Propaganda,Thriller, War
